content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the maple beanie with a photo and video tutorial available as an instant download sizes newborn all the way up to adult skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn worsted weight yarn - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - please note that all of these patterns can be found for free with ads on my blog here http //www cjdesignblog com/ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - returns/refunds there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use hashtag #themaplebeanie resell finished product with pattern credit © 2022 cj design all rights reserved
